i_intro_fishless_DS1_setup.text_template: You are doing a 'Dark Start'. By keeping lights OFF and plants OUT, we prevent algae while the filter matures. It requires patience but guarantees a cleaner start.

text_variants.1: This phase is short and focused. Plan for about 1 day.
text_variants.3: This phase is short and focused. Plan for about 3 days.
text_variants.7: Plan for about 7 days for this phase.
text_variants.14: Plan for about 14 days for this phase.
text_variants.28: Plan for about 28 days for this phase.
text_variants.indefinite: This phase has no fixed end date. Continue until you choose to move on.

text_variants.stone: Rinse your stones to remove loose dust before placing them.
text_variants.wood: Soak your driftwood, glue it to rocks, or weigh it down. Dry wood floats!
text_variants.mixed: Rinse your stones to remove loose dust before placing them. Soak your driftwood, glue it to rocks, or weigh it down. Dry wood floats!

i_hard_composition_tips.text_template: Hardscape tip: use odd numbers and a strong focal point (rule of thirds). Keep the front open for depth.

i_water_fill_prep_bag_or_plate.text_template: Time to fill! Place a plastic bag or plate on the substrate and pour water onto **that** to prevent clouding.

i_water_chlorine_treat_full_volume.text_template: Since you have chlorine/chloramine, we must treat the full tank volume. If using a hose, add the conditioner to the tank *before* filling.

i_equip_filter_on.text_template: Run the filter 24/7. Oxygen is vital for the bacteria.

i_light_dark_rule.text_template: Verify that all light sources are disabled. Light is the enemy of the Dark Start.

i_chem_baseline_ph_gh_kh.text_template: Measure your baseline pH, GH, and KH so we know your starting water chemistry.

text_variants.inert:true: You will begin manual ammonia dosing to start the cycle.
text_variants.inert:false: Inert substrate requires an ammonia source to begin the cycle. Since you have selected not to use a source of ammonia, your best bet is to ghost feed the tank, to make decaying food act as an ammonia source.
text_variants.aquasoil:any: Since you're using aquasoil that's designed to leach ammonia for the first few weeks when it's submerged, you have an automatic ammonia dispenser. If Ammonia rises above >5 ppm, do a 50% water change.

e_water_cloudy_bloom.text_template: Cloudy or milky water is normal early on. It can be substrate dust, microbubbles, or a bacterial bloom. Unless we say otherwise, don't chase it with big water changes.

text_variants.wood: Tea-colored water from tannins and white fuzzy fungus on driftwood are both normal early on. They are harmless and fade over time.
mixed: Tea-colored water from tannins and white fuzzy fungus on driftwood are both normal early on. They are harmless and fade over time.
Light dust from stone can cause some early cloudiness. It clears with time.
text_variants.stone: Light dust from stone can cause some early cloudiness. It clears with time.

text_variants.inert: Rinse your sand/gravel in a bucket until the water runs clear. This prevents permanent cloudiness.
text_variants.aquasoil: Handle your Aquasoil gently. Do NOT rinse it. Rinsing active soil breaks down the nutrient pellets and turns your tank into a mud bath.

t_sub_place_slope.text_template: Pour and slope the substrate (higher in the back, lower in the front) to create depth.

t_hard_finalize_layout.text_template: Finalize your hardscape layout. Make sure it is stable and won't shift during planting.

text_variants.conditioner_generic: Add a water conditioner to treat the full tank volume.
text_variants.gh: Dissolve {{doses.gh_remineralizer.fullfill_dose_amount}} {{products.gh_remineralizer.dose_unit}} of {{products.gh_remineralizer.display_name}} in bucket before filling.
text_variants.ghkh: Dissolve {{doses.gh_kh_remineralizer.fullfill_dose_amount}} {{products.gh_kh_remineralizer.dose_unit}} of {{products.gh_kh_remineralizer.display_name}} in bucket before filling.
text_variants.kh: Dissolve {{doses.kh_buffer.fullfill_dose_amount}} {{products.kh_buffer.dose_unit}} of {{products.kh_buffer.display_name}} in bucket before filling.

t_equip_filter_turn_on.text_template: Turn on the filter and confirm steady flow. Prime first if using canister filter.

text_variants.false: Ghost feed the tank so decaying food can act as an ammonia source.
